General.Name: Brockhaus Capital Management AG
General.Description: Brockhaus Technologies AG is a private equity firm. The firm specializing in middle market, later stage, mature, growth capital and buyout investments. It operates as a technology holding company that acquires and holds majority stakes in growth companies in the German speaking region. Brockhaus Technologies AG was founded in 2017 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Marco  Brockhaus
0.Title: Founder, CEO & Chairman of Management Board

2.Title: COO, Legal Counsel & Member of the Management Board
